hero.description: Due to new Spotify API policies, public access is temporarily restricted. You can explore the full functionality in Demo Mode, or deploy your own app with your API keys in 5 minutes.

features.title: Your Musical DNA
features.subtitle: Visualize your taste. VibeCheck breaks down your library into atoms.

analytics.title: Top Stats
analytics.desc: Analysis of your most played tracks and artists. Discover who really shapes your music taste.

audio.title: Audio Metrics
audio.desc: Analysis of BPM, energy, and danceability. See your music from a technical perspective.

mood.title: Vibe Meter
mood.desc: Detecting the overall mood of your library: from calm melancholy to energetic drive.

history.title: Listening History
history.desc: We automatically save your listening history to the database for future analysis.

step1.title: Spotify API
step1.desc: Secure OAuth 2.0 authentication to securely fetch user listening history and saved tracks.

step2.title: Data Analysis
step2.desc: The algorithm scans hundreds of tracks, calculating audio features (BPM, energy, valence).

step3.title: Visual Dashboards
step3.desc: Raw data is transformed into clean, interactive charts using Recharts and Tailwind CSS.
